title: @Meddler: Any changes planned for Zilean ?
body:
He practically doens't have a pickrate :S

i've seen all kind of suggestion about new passives or reworked abilities, is Riot planning any kind of rework on him ?

replies.body: We've got a few tweaks for him planned for somewhere around 5.21-5.22. Looking at some small responsiveness improvements to his Q (attach logic and feel improvements), plus we're exploring some experiemental stuff with his passive (still giving XP to allies, but potentially in a way that generates at least a little more interaction on the Zilean player's part).

Is there any chance you could make his Q targeted when cast on allies?

Zilean's Q and Bard's ult are the only two ally-targetable abilities in the game that can actually miss, and Bard's ult actually has a reason to work like that (since it's an aoe that happens to affect allies and enemies).

You already have to think about aiming skillshots to deal with your opponents, it would be nice if you didn't have to worry about your own allies accidentally dodging your stuff.

Can you make him "tag" people when he gets in a certain range (maybe shorten it compared to live), and then have them have increased exp for X seconds? (eg: 10-15 would be nice - 20-30 would be neat if you feel like completely reworking/tweaking it).

That way, as a jungler, I could actually get extra exp from a camp without Zilean standing attached to my hip when the monster dies.

(And of course, it would constantly refresh while Zilean stays in range)

He needs a near kit rework in the current state he is in, I'm afraid. The changes just to his bomb alone really hurt him. Taking away making it a click ability made it, not useless, but a helluva lot less impactful and successful, and basically his bomb harass and his ult are the main parts of his kit. Taking one away (which it essentially did, as dodging his Q is ridiculously easy now, as someone who has played against it a good few times now) hurt him.

He needs some real love, and I have a feeling he isn't going to get it. Hard to power budget him I imagine with how strong his ult really is.
